bibl.title: Nessanskie papirusy: osnovnye problemy social'no-ekonomiceskoj i politiceskoj istorii Juznoii Palestiny IV-VII vv. [Papyri from Nessana: The Main Problems of the Social, Economic and Political History of South Palestina in the 4th-7th Centuries.]
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. BZ 93 (2000), Bibliographische Notizen, No. 169.

GRUSEVOJ A.G., Nessanskie papirusy: osnovnye problemy social'no-ekonomiceskoj i politiceskoj istorii Juznoii Palestiny IV-VII vv. [Papyri from Nessana: The Main Problems of the Social, Economic and Political History of South Palestina in the 4th-7th Centuries.]
